name: Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria: Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are:
– using the correct and complete set of drawings
– all drawings are the latest revision
Reference Documents: Drawings and drawing registers
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity
Acceptance Criteria: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS & WP
Reference Documents: PSP, EMP, TGS, SWMS, WP
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: Pipes supplied shall be of the category and diameter shown on the drawings
○ Material shall be as indicated on the project drawings and / or shall conform to the following:-
• uPVC slotted spigot and socket sub-soil drainage pipes.
• Fibre reinforced cement slotted spigot and socket sub-soil drainage pipes.
• Geo textile must be of A34
Record of conformity: This ITP signed off
Acceptance Criteria: An excavation permit must be issued prior to any excavation commencing.
• Plant and equipment shall be appropriate for the task.
• Excavation operations shall not disturb areas outside the limit of excavation
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed

Acceptance Criteria: Superintendent inspection of proposed underground outlet location. Outlets shall be installed through walls of pits, provided inverts are not below the top level of the outfall drain.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed
Acceptance Criteria: Excavations for sub-soil drains shall conform to the requirements specified for excavation for services subject to the following specific requirements and modifications:
• Trench depth and width shall be as shown on the Drawings.
• Trench bases shall be uniformly graded to an even fall as necessary to suit whichever of the following is applicable:
• Parallel with pavement or kerb and channel formation grade.
• Parallel with overall grade of stepped footings.
○ If it is not possible to conform to any of the above requirements, the Contractor shall notify the Superintendent and await direction before continuing with the affected part of the work.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: The bottom of the trench shall be well compacted and evenly graded suitable material, 25mm minimum depth of 20mm Class 3 FCR

• If rock excavation was necessary and if the bottom of the trench is uneven, all low and rough areas shall be filled, and solid rock outcrops covered with bedding material to a compacted thickness of not less than 25 mm.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: Sub-Soil drain to be 100mm Dia. PVC Class 1000 Agricultural drain.
• The pipes shall be laid true to line and gradient on the graded compacted bedding.
• Pipes shall be jointed to fit tightly by pushing the spigots firmly into the sockets. For pipes without sockets, special end jointing fittings shall be used.
• Fittings shall be compatible with pipe material.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: Superintendant inspection of Subsoil drain backfill prior to covering
• Backfill needs to to encase subsoil drain and cover upto 150mm over to allow for sediment collection.
• Backfill to be 14mm screenings to subgrade.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: At full depth pavement joints 100ø class 1000 pvc pipe sub-surface drain type 2 with filter fabric around trench (150mm Overlap) with "no fines" concrete filter
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: A flush out riser is to be located at the Back of kerb (BOK), comprsing of 100mm UPVC PIPE, capped.
• Minimum 200m intervals along road alignments, a single flushout points at high point or at locations within WSUD/Raingardens.
Record of conformity: This ITP signed
Acceptance Criteria: The survey shall include pickup of location and depth of installed sub-soil drainage and location of any inlet/outlet/flush out points.
• Lot Maps shall be completed to show the extent of works for each lot.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
